data.title: Brown County Health Deapartment
data.meta_description: The Brown County Health Department carries out the mandated services required by the Ohio Department of Health, the Ohio Revised Code (ORC) and the Ohio Administrative Code (OAC). We are located in Georgetown, Ohio.
data.text:
The Brown County Health Department carries out the mandated services required by the Ohio Department of Health, the Ohio Revised Code (ORC) and the Ohio Administrative Code (OAC). In addition to those mandated services, the health department provides both services for fees and free services in order to maintain the best health possible for our citizens in Brown County. The following is a list of the services provided by our department:

Fee Covered Services

Vital Statistics

Food Service inspections

Public pool/spa inspections

Campground inspections

Tattoo/Body piercing facility inspections

Household Wastewater permits/inspections

Private Well/Cistern permits/inspections

Private water sampling

Solid Waste/Landfill inspections

Infectious waste generator inspections

Construction, Demolition & Debris facility inspections

Plumbing permits –commercial/residential

Proposed subdivision reviews

Immunizations childhood/adult/overseas travel

Pregnancy testing

Home daycare inspections

Bureau of Children w/ medical handicaps

Cholesterol screenings

​

Free/Non-funded Services

Public health nuisance inspections

Housing complaint inspections

School and playground safety inspections

Composting facility inspections

Detention center inspections

Blood pressure screenings

Scoliosis screenings

Communicable disease surveillance and reporting

Lead level referrals

Syringe Exchange

Vision screening clinics

NARCAN Training

HIV testing

Head lice checks

Animal Bite investigations

​
